creations.title: Coca-Cola 'Real Magic' Holiday 2025
creations.description: Heartwarming holiday campaign showcasing AI-generated family moments that brought people together during the 2025 holiday season.
creations.longDescription: Coca-Cola's groundbreaking 2025 holiday campaign used AI to create deeply personal family moments. The campaign generated over 2.3M views and set a new standard for AI-generated advertising.

breakdown.concept: Create authentic family moments that feel real and emotionally resonant
process: Generated base scenes with Sora 2 Pro using detailed family moment prompts
Added voiceover narration with ElevenLabs for emotional depth
Refined transitions and color grading with Runway Gen-4
Composited multiple AI-generated scenes into cohesive narrative
challenges: Maintaining consistent character appearance across scenes
Achieving natural family interactions and expressions
Balancing AI generation with brand authenticity
results: Featured in AdWeek as 'AI Campaign of the Year'

prompts.prompt: Warm family gathering around Christmas tree, golden hour lighting streaming through windows, grandmother laughing with grandchildren, cinematic 4K, emotional depth, natural movements

creations.title: The Last Human - Indie Short
creations.description: Award-winning sci-fi short exploring humanity's future in a world where AI has surpassed human intelligence.
creations.longDescription: Created entirely by one person over 3 months using AI tools, this 12-minute short film won Best Sci-Fi Short at the 2025 Indie Film Festival. A meditation on consciousness, humanity, and what it means to be the last of your kind.
awards: Best Sci-Fi Short - Indie Film Festival 2025
Audience Choice Award - AI Film Fest 2025

breakdown.concept: One-person production exploring what makes us human
breakdown.timeline: 3 months from concept to final cut
process: Wrote script using traditional screenwriting methods
Generated environment shots with Veo 3 for wide establishing scenes
Created character close-ups and dialogue scenes with Runway Gen-4
Composed original score with Udio to match emotional beats
Added character voices with ElevenLabs for consistency
Edited in DaVinci Resolve for final color grading
challenges: Creating believable futuristic environments on zero budget
Balancing AI generation with artistic vision
results: Distribution deal with indie streaming platform

prompts.prompt: Close-up of weathered astronaut face, single tear, dramatic side lighting, 4K cinematic, emotional performance, shallow depth of field
Abandoned futuristic city, overgrown with nature, golden sunset, wide establishing shot, cinematic drone movement, 4K
prompts.settings: 4K, 15 seconds, camera movement: slow forward dolly

creations.title: Neon Dreams - Music Video
creations.description: Synthwave visual journey through a cyberpunk cityscape, perfectly synced to the beat.
creations.longDescription: Luna Park's breakthrough music video that went viral on TikTok and YouTube. Created entirely with AI tools in a bedroom studio, the video features stunning cyberpunk visuals that perfectly complement the synthwave track.

breakdown.concept: Cyberpunk visual narrative matching synthwave energy
process: Generated cyberpunk cityscape scenes with Veo 3.1
Created beat-synced transitions with Runway Gen-4
Color graded for neon aesthetic in DaVinci Resolve
challenges: Syncing AI-generated visuals to music beats
Maintaining consistent neon aesthetic across scenes
Creating smooth transitions between generated clips
results: Viral on TikTok with 500K+ uses in user videos

prompts.prompt: Neon-lit cyberpunk city street, rain-soaked pavement reflecting pink and blue lights, flying cars overhead, cinematic camera movement through alley, 4K

categories.name: Social Content
categories.description: TikTok, Instagram, and social media content
